featured.text: This was a slow process, requiring much skill and patience, and every page of every book had to be cut separately.

other.text: I’ve only got the first two pages.

definition.zh_def: 頁面；書籍或文件中的一頁。
definition.en_def: A single side of a sheet of paper in a book, magazine, or other document.
definition.example: Please turn to the next page to continue reading.
